welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schwyz, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes, fascinating history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buochs Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buochs Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and main terminal at Zurich Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zurich Airport, primarily serving European and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per session.
